info.name: Lester Table Lamp
info.description:
The big bold copper bottle and dramatic black shade, the Lester table lamp adds a touch of glamour to any room.

Dimensions:Height 51.5cm Width 30cm
Composition: Metal, glass, acetate
Bulb requirement:1 x 60W Max BC GLS (bulb not included)
Self assembly requirements:no
Care Instructions:wipe clean with a soft dry cloth
